allowExecutor(bytes4,bool).details: make a function either only callable by the governor, or callable by gov and executor.

userdoc.notice: This contract accepts calls to admin-level functions of an underlying contract, and         ensures the caller holds an appropriate role for calling that function. There are two roles:          - A Governor can call anything          - An Executor can call specific functions specified at construction         Random callers cannot call anything through this contract, even if the underlying function         is unpermissioned in the underlying contract.         Calls to non-admin functions should be called at the underlying contract directly.
